subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It is early yet, but the 2009 off-season may be remembered as the year when the richest teams got richer, the richest players got squeezed and the middle class got crowded.
snippet: It is early yet, but the 2009 off-season may be remembered as the year when the richest teams got richer, the richest players got squeezed and the middle class got crowded.
